titles: Times alteration: or, The old mans rehearsall, what braue dayes he knew a great while agone, when his old cap was new. To the tune of, Ile nere be drunke againe.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?
publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcocke,
notes: Verse: "VVhen this old cap was new ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by STC.
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
